name: Icarus Dive
desc: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.

name: Shadow Wave
desc: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

name: Magic Missile
desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

name: Pulse Nova
desc: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.

name: Snowball
desc: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

name: Ice Armor
desc: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

name: Overgrowth
desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

name: Feast
desc: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

name: Voodoo Restoration
desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

name: Arcane Curse
desc: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.
